name: Stolen Thunder - A Unique Action Puzzle Adventure
name_original: Stolen Thunder - A Unique Action Puzzle Adventure
description:
**LAUNCH SALE!** Download NOW for only $0.99! **PAY ONCE AND PLAY!**

WILL YOU SURVIVE? Prove your puzzle-solving skills NOW!

STOLEN THUNDER is an action - puzzle - adventure game with a unique out of this world style and design. Take control with simple swipe gestures and solve intricate puzzles inside an abstract world unlike anything you've seen.

EASY TO LEARN & DIFFICULT TO MASTER
Swipe to move & tap to strike. Can you survive all the Challenges?

- 12 Unique Puzzle Challenges (hours of gameplay)
- Mind and physics bending puzzles
- Learn the puzzle mechanics, then test yourself with fast-paced timed Challenges
- Play entirely one-handed with touch-optimized controls
- Several enemies and hazards around every corner

NO IN-APP PURCHASES
Pay once and experience the entire game.

**DEVICE REQUIREMENTS**
You must have one of the devices below to play this game:

- iPhone 5 (or newer)
- iPad Air (or newer)
- iPod touch (6th Generation)
